actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 94-484, the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976, as amended, relating to the immigration of foreign medical  graduates.

summary.text: Amends the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976 to revise the criteria by which an alien who is a graduate of a medical school shall be considered to have passed parts I and II of the National Board of Medical Examiners Examination for purposes of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 94-484, the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976, as amended, relating to the immigration of foreign medical  graduates.
